title: Why do i get put with a whole team of feeders
body: I was the only one on blind normal who was on a 4 to 0 streak i look at bot and top lane they have fed the opposite team more 16 deaths including jg why am i getting teamed up with feeders cant you put players with the same skill set on my team fuck man it ruins the game makes us tilt cause i cant enjoy a game once they are fed and i will get banned because i cant tolerate how the brain of some people work. I have to keep my mouth shut and kiss the feeders asses fuck that riot DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS BS

replies.body: Can we abuse the feeders cause they wont sur they have fed and it's not enjoyable trying to fight a lost battle. Instead makes you want to rage an abuse them what can we do riot about feeders who don't listen to anyone

Well, you *can* abuse them (in the sense that you have the ability to do so), but you'll more than likely get hit with a punishment if you do (potentially a ban), so I wouldn't recommend it.

As for your... "issue", I'm not seeing it. I've looked a bit at your recent match history and it seems that a lot of the players you've been matched with that have had low K/D/A ratios were just having a bad game. Looking through their match histories, it seems relatively common for them to be getting scores "typical" of low elo, even those on the "lower" side of K/D/A ratios.

With that in mind, I couldn't help but notice that you yourself occasionally get 10+ deaths in a given match, and not always with significant takedowns either. Am I to assume that you were feeding in those situations? Or would you agree that they were simple "bad games", whether it be due to tilt, or being abuse or "bad" teammates, whatever else might be the case? Because, honestly, if you're going to be claiming these players are "feeding", then the same must also apply to you, given some of the ratios you get.

Something to consider, anyway.

Well its hard not to die to a fed team 
LMAO

i bet you don't even play the game so you don't have no idea what it's like i read the forum on riot's staff you guys don't even play LOL cause you guys are so bad but you can judge me by looking at history not watching the match. lmao

I think you entirely missed the point. The point was, if you consider having 10+ deaths feeding, and that players who achieve those scores should be punished, then you too would fall into that category. Everyone has those games. To expect others to be perfect players, while you yourself aren't one (noone is), is entirely unreasonable.

In your recent games you've had 7 games with more than 10 deaths, should you be punished for those games?

You are missing the point im not talking about people having a bad game im talking about the poeple who just keep walking in even though you and the team tell them not to. I,m not the best player but i dont intentionally feed you and your staff can suck a fat one trying to harass me for my comments funny i have more than 18 poeple trying to add me to stand up against you guys lol for this reason all of you come together to attack a individual for his comment but the funny thing is you see my kd but you dont watch the match so you dont have a understanding of where i coming from instead of looking at kd and jumping to conclusion bad mouthing me watch the match. So don't act like you know everything when you don't even know what happened in the match you fool.

Noone is harassing you, if anything it's you doing the harassing. Disagreeing with you and discussing that disagreement is not the same as harassing. Throwing insults around like "go suck a fat one" is harassing. There's also no staff here, I'm only a volunteer and HeartVine has no affiliation to Riot at all. HeartVine's point was all those people you seem to think are intent feeding appear to have just had bad games. 

Tilt and intent feeding aren't the same thing. Disagreeing with you as to how a game or teamfight should be played and intent feeding are not the same thing. Dying a bunch by getting caught out of position and intent feeding are not the same thing.

NOT WATCHING THE MATCH AND COMING UP WITH THEORIES TO ACCUSE ME ISN'T DISAGREEING ITS DEGRADING.
ANYWAYS I'M DONE WITH THIS DISCUSSION  {{champion:141}}
out of my recent 20 matches i have 4 losses so thats 16  wins

Heartvine trying to be reasonable with you, so you abuse him/her.... and you think your teams are bad mayhaps riot is aware of your toxicity, so puts you with players of similar mindset, also, maybe before you criticise other feeders, look at your own history you have a lot of games with neg kda even in some of your wins...
